      • base64DecodeIfNeededAndUnzip

        public static java.io.InputStream base64DecodeIfNeededAndUnzip(javax.activation.DataHandler handler)
                                                        throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method base64 decodes and unzips the handler's InputStream. If appears that handler's InputStream is not base64 encoded, then is will be only unzipped.
        Parameters:
        handler - handler which stream needs to be decoded and unzipped
        Returns:
        decoded and unzipped InputStream
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • extractAttachment

        @Loggable
public static javax.activation.DataHandler extractAttachment(org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext messageContext,
                                                                        java.lang.String attachmentContentId)
                                                                 throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds and returns DataHandler of the attachment by attachment content id.
        Parameters:
        messageContext - context to search for attachment
        attachmentContentId - content id of the attachment to find
        Returns:
        DataHandler of the found attachment
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • addAttachment

        @Loggable
public static java.lang.String addAttachment(org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext messageContext,
                                                        javax.activation.DataHandler attachmentHandler)
                                                 throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method adds attachment to the context and returns generated content id of the attachment.
        Parameters:
        messageContext - context to add attachment to
        attachmentHandler - DataHandler of the attachment to add
        Returns:
        content id of the added attachment
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs
